description: Draft:An exemplary sub-schema of VDA 231-301 for the 3.1 Certificate Data Exchange according to EN 10204
title: Draft: VDA 231-301 Test Report – 3.1 Certificate Data Exchange

_schemaVersion.description: The URL of the schema version that defines the structure of this test report.

Tester.description: The person who executed the test.

StartTime.description: The date the execution of the test began.

Tester.description: The person who executed the test.

StartTime.description: The date the execution of the test began.

Value.description: Tensile value with precision to 1 decimal places
Elongation A50 generic regardless of type

3-1_Certificate.ChangeOfWidthValue.description: Change of Width value in millimeters

Value.description: Strain value with precision to 4 decimal places

3-1_Certificate.StrainValue.description: Strain value with precision to 4 decimal places

3-1_Certificate.TimeValue.description: Time in seconds with precision to 2 decimal places

3-1_Tensile_Certificate.ArraySpec.description: Specification of array structure for tensile testing data.

3-1_Tensile_Certificate.ArrayValue.description: Values corresponding to the tensile testing data.

3-1_Composition_Certificate.ArraySpec.description: Specification of array structure for composition testing data.

3-1_Composition_Certificate.ArrayValue.description: Values corresponding to the composition testing data.

3-1_Composition_Certificate.ArrayValueTa.description: Values corresponding to the composition testing data for target values.

3-1_Composition_Certificate.FractionValu.description: Fraction value in percent with precision to 2 decimal places

maxValue.description: Fraction value in percent with precision to 2 decimal places

minValue.description: Fraction value in percent with precision to 2 decimal places

Generic.ArrayValue.description: An array that can contain strings, numbers, objects, arrays and null.

Specifications.description: A list of associated specifications regarding this component.

DeviationSpecificationText.description: The text describing allowed deviation from the specification.

DeviationSpecificationCodeFile.description: The JSON file containing the deviation specification code.

Date.description: Date field that adheres to the ISO 8601 format (2000-02-01) or the European style (01.02.2000)

Timestamp.description: Unix timestamp; time since January 1st 1970 UTC in seconds

Generic.DateMonth.description: Date string that only stores year and month in the ISO 8601 format 'YYYY-MM'

Generic.Identifier.description: Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) as a 128-bit value in hexadecimal coding, noted in five groups, standardised by RFC 4122[1].

Generic.LocationIdentification.description: One or more identifiers for a location.

Generic.LongString.description: A string with a maximum length of 240 and no leading or trailing whitespaces.

Generic.ProcessStep.description: A schema representing a single step in a process, including its index and associated regulation.

Index.description: The sequential index of the process step.

ProcessData.description: The information set related to this process step.

Specification.description: The regulation associated with this process step.

Generic.ProperNameString.description: A string with max length of 80, no leading or trailing whitespace, and only the Unicode code pages Basic Latin & Latin-1 Supplement

Generic.PropertyWithTolerance.description: A schema representing a property with its value, unit, and tolerance.

Unit.description: The unit of measurement for the property value.

ValueType.description: The type of the property value.

Generic.RestrictedString.description: A string with max length of 50, no leading or trailing whitespace, and only 7-bit ASCII characters

Tester.description: The person who executed the test.

StartTime.description: The date the execution of the test began.

Generic.RestrictedText.description: A string with max length of 1000 and only 7-bit ASCII characters

Generic.Unit.description: A string with max length of 20, no leading or trailing whitespace, and only 7-bit ASCII characters plus Ω and µ

Generic.Value.description: A generic value. Specific sub-schemas may restrict the type of the value.
